name: Greed Boxes
storyline:
Our world has been overrun by loot boxes.
You are the chosen one to defeat greed and capitalism.
Destroy them instead of spending your money.
Maybe you will get some nice loot in the process.
Are you ready?
summary: Greed Boxes is a 2D clicker game. Our world has been overrun by loot boxes. You are the chosen one to defeat greed and capitalism. Destroy them instead of spending your money. Maybe you will get some nice loot in the process. Are you ready?
